casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronald Lee POINDEXTER. No. 563A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 5, 2004. Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, Gretchen M. Engel, Durham, for Poindexter. Valerie Spalding, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of November 2004 by Defendant to Correct the Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of November 2004."
